text: @mhp_guy Chris this actually speaks to my experience with trying to sell AI front desk agents. After 40 hours of tinkering and crafting and 100 cold calls and texts, almost nobody is interested.offered  150 a month for call receptionist and after hours help. Not full stack with scheduling

A coyote marking his territory the old-fashioned way, with a howl that says “occupied.”

These calls help maintain pack bonds and signal rivals to keep their distance.

Even after hours, the land in Emigrant Gap stays active. 

#Species #WildlifeObservation #EmigrantGap #40Acres https://t.co/b3PPnnr5E0
An AI receptionist answers phone calls, books appointments, and responds to common questions. Patients get help right away, even after hours.
